Translations.Text: My inspirovat ona mat rad my inspirovat Noah prophets him. My inspirovat Abraham Ismail Isaac Jacob Patriarchs Jesus Zamestnanie Jonah Aaron Solomon. My dat David Zalm
Posol my told ona posol my never told ona about GOD spoke do Moses directly
Posol deliver dobry zvest i mat rad warnings. Thus ludia have excuse when they face GOD after all these posol pojdem them. GOD bol Almighty Wise
GOD bears svedok zaujem co He revealed ona; He revealed it Jeho znalost! angels bear svedok i GOD suffices mat rad svedok
Iste those disbelieve zapudit way GOD have strayed daleko astray
Those disbelieve transgress GOD will nie forgive them nor will He guide them v any way
way do Hell, wherein they abide forever This bol easy GOD robit
O zaludnit posol pojdem ona truth z tvoj Lord Therefore ona verit tvoj own dobre Ona disbelieve potom GOD belongs everything heavens zem. GOD bol Omniscient Wise
